i ordered this product with optimism after reading many useless books, i must say i was really surprise with this course. I think it's very useful for everyone; novice to advanced. i am a trader with little experience and was continuously losing my money but after using a few techniques i learned in this course i am actually making consistent net profits each month that i am very happy with. this course has changed everything for me, my only regret is that i haven't bought this product earlier. i highly recommend this to every one.
This course is easy to use and easy to understand. It's very informative; recommended for both beginners and people who already know their way around. I give it two thumbs up.
